kw.doc: Loads a WSDL from the given URL and creates a Zeep client. List all Available operations/methods with INFO log level.

kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Call SOAP Method
kw.doc: If the webservice have simple SOAP operation/method with few arguments, you can call the method with the given `name` and `args`.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.
